remarks: The properties of a normed complex vector space, which is a vector space accompanied by a norm.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvi.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvi.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvi.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvi.5 $e |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) $.
nvi.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvi $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( <. G , S >. e. CVecOLD /\ N : X --> RR /\ A. x e. X ( ( ( N ` x ) = 0 -> x = Z ) /\ A. y e. CC ( N ` ( y S x ) ) = ( ( abs ` y ) x. ( N ` x ) ) /\ A. y e. X ( N ` ( x G y ) ) <_ ( ( N ` x ) + ( N ` y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d G x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d U x $.
$d X x y $.
